javadoc: Simple interface to handle dealing with whitespace in strings when wrapping.

methods.name: countSpaces
methods.comment:
Counts the number of contiguous spaces in the given string starting from the 
 given offset.

params.name: offset
params.comment: the offset in the string at which to start

methods.name: trim
methods.comment: Trim the given string (or don't, it's up to the implementation).

name: WhitespaceHandler
comment: Simple interface to handle dealing with whitespace in strings when wrapping.
